title: Will i get Ban?
body: Recent game i was lagging a crap tone! Like 6000 ms and i did wanna feed so i stuck near base and keep in mind i was reconnecting and disconnecting i finally reconnected cause i guess the internet stabilized itself. This is the only time is happened but will i get penalized for it? wHEN I RECONNECTED I tried my best to help the game.

replies.body: You can get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) if you have a frequency of leaves and afk's, not just one game.  If you're having these high pings, definitely run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your network.  The [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can also help give an overview of what's going on.  Let me know if you have any questions!
